CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |
| PSCs |
| PCE |

Note:

* "Polymer" is a material name in the context of the paragraph, as it refers to a type of material used in solar cells.
* "PSCs" is an abbreviation for "polymer solar cells", which is a type of material/device made of polymer.
* "PCE" is an abbreviation for "power conversion efficiency", which is a property of solar cells and not a material name.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "PSCs" and "PCE", do not clearly refer to material names and have been removed from the table.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency |
| PCE |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
* Advanced donor and/or acceptor materials
* Device engineering
* Fabrication processes

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the Property Value entities in the given paragraph:

| Property Value | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) | 10% |
| PCE | 10% |

The paragraph mentions the property value "10%" twice, once as "power conversion efficiency (PCE) exceeding 10%" and again as "PCE of 10%". Therefore, we have two entities with the same value, "10%", but with different property names, "power conversion efficiency (PCE)" and "PCE".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Value of material property":

| Property Value | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) | 10% |

The paragraph only mentions one property value, which is the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 10%. The other mentions of "10%" in the paragraph are not referring to a material property value, but rather to a threshold or benchmark for the power conversion efficiency. Therefore, the only valid entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property value is "Power conversion efficiency (PCE) = 10%".
